title: Who Is Paige DeSorbo’s Boyfriend? Craig Conover’s Job & Relationship History
description: Paige DeSorbo has found love again and fans are eager to know all about her new boyfriend. The popular Summer House star is one of the most beloved cast members of the Bravo show. Naturally, her personal life became a point of interest for fans who are curious about her romantic relationship. So, here’s everything […] The post Who Is Paige DeSorbo’s Boyfriend? Craig Conover’s Job & Relationship History appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Namrata Ghosh
excerpt: Here's everything we know about Paige DeSorbo's boyfriend Craig Conover, how they met and their relationship timeline.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Paige DeSorbo has found love again and fans are eager to know all about her new boyfriend. The popular Summer House star is one of the most beloved cast members of the Bravo show. Naturally, her personal life became a point of interest for fans who are curious about her romantic relationship. So, here’s everything we know about Paige DeSorbo’s boyfriend, how they met, and their relationship timeline. Who is Paige DeSorbo dating? Paige DeSorbo is currently dating Craig Conover. Conover was born on February 9, 1989 in Fenwick Island, Delaware. (via US Weekly) He attended the College of Charleston, from where he graduated in 2010 with a Bachelor of Science degree. Conover then went on to study in Charleston School of Law, but he didn’t receive his law degree after failing to submit his final thesis paper. On April 17, 2017, he passed the South Carolina Bar exam. (via Bravo) What is Craig Conover’s job? Craig Conover is a television personality. Paige DeSorbo’s boyfriend is best known for being a cast member of Bravo reality television shows Southern Charm, Summer House, and its spin-off Winter House. Besides his career on television, Conover is a successful businessman. Conover launched his sewing lifestyle brand Sewing Down South in 2019, also opening a flagship store in Charleston two years later. On March 18, 2021, he also opened the law firm The Craig Conover Law Firm in Charleston. Additionally Conover is the co-owner of two restaurants- Mesu in Charleston, and Carriage House in New York City. Paige DeSorbo and Craig Conover’s relationship history Paige DeSorbo met her boyfriend Craig Conover around 2018, while they were both starring in their respective Bravo reality shows. She had revealed that the two started out as just friends before making things romantic. In February 2021, the pair got to know each other while they were filming Winter House. (via US Weekly) However, Conover was in a relationship with Natalie Hegnauer at that point. Things got interesting when in May of the same year, the entrepreneur revealed that he was single. Soon after, reliable sources confirmed that DeSorbo and Conover had officially begun dating. DeSorbo revealed that they confirmed their romance publicly by sharing a picture together from the September 2021 wedding of their Summer House co-stars, Kyle Cooke and Amanda Batula. The couple also made their relationship Instagram official in December of the same year with a heartwarming post. , Since then, Paige DeSorbo and her boyfriend have often gushed about each other in interviews and frequently share pictures together on social media. Additionally, Craig Conover appears alongside her on Summer House. The couple appears to be going steady as of writing, and the two look radiant posing together in their various public appearances.
html:
Paige DeSorbo has found love again and fans are eager to know all about her new boyfriend. The popular Summer House star is one of the most beloved cast members of the Bravo show. Naturally, her personal life became a point of interest for fans who are curious about her romantic relationship.

So, here’s everything we know about Paige DeSorbo’s boyfriend, how they met, and their relationship timeline.

Who is Paige DeSorbo dating?

Paige DeSorbo is currently dating Craig Conover.

Conover was born on February 9, 1989 in Fenwick Island, Delaware. (via US Weekly) He attended the College of Charleston, from where he graduated in 2010 with a Bachelor of Science degree. Conover then went on to study in Charleston School of Law, but he didn’t receive his law degree after failing to submit his final thesis paper. On April 17, 2017, he passed the South Carolina Bar exam. (via Bravo)

What is Craig Conover’s job?

Craig Conover is a television personality.

Paige DeSorbo’s boyfriend is best known for being a cast member of Bravo reality television shows Southern Charm, Summer House, and its spin-off Winter House. Besides his career on television, Conover is a successful businessman.

Conover launched his sewing lifestyle brand Sewing Down South in 2019, also opening a flagship store in Charleston two years later. On March 18, 2021, he also opened the law firm The Craig Conover Law Firm in Charleston. Additionally Conover is the co-owner of two restaurants- Mesu in Charleston, and Carriage House in New York City.

Paige DeSorbo and Craig Conover’s relationship history

Paige DeSorbo met her boyfriend Craig Conover around 2018, while they were both starring in their respective Bravo reality shows. She had revealed that the two started out as just friends before making things romantic. In February 2021, the pair got to know each other while they were filming Winter House. (via US Weekly)

However, Conover was in a relationship with Natalie Hegnauer at that point. Things got interesting when in May of the same year, the entrepreneur revealed that he was single. Soon after, reliable sources confirmed that DeSorbo and Conover had officially begun dating.

DeSorbo revealed that they confirmed their romance publicly by sharing a picture together from the September 2021 wedding of their Summer House co-stars, Kyle Cooke and Amanda Batula. The couple also made their relationship Instagram official in December of the same year with a heartwarming post. ,

Since then, Paige DeSorbo and her boyfriend have often gushed about each other in interviews and frequently share pictures together on social media. Additionally, Craig Conover appears alongside her on Summer House. The couple appears to be going steady as of writing, and the two look radiant posing together in their various public appearances.
